name: sample-angularjs-migration
description: sample application to demonstrate angularjs migration

scripts.build: npm run lint && tsc && cp -r config dist/backend && cp -r config dist/frontend && copyfiles -e **/*.ts -u 1 src/frontend/**/*.* dist
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test-int: npm run rebuild && set NODE_ENV=testing&& set DB_USER=testdb2019&& set DB_PASSWORD=testdb2019&& nyc mocha --opts "mocha.opts" "src/**/integration-tests/**/*.spec.ts"
scripts.test: npm run rebuild && set NODE_ENV=testing&& set DB_USER=testdb2019&& set DB_PASSWORD=testdb2019&& nyc mocha --opts "mocha.opts" "src/**/*.spec.ts"
scripts.frontend-nodemon: nodemon --verbose --watch src/frontend -e js,html,css --exec "copyfiles -e **/*.ts -u 1 src/frontend/**/*.* dist && npm run start-server"
scripts.dev-frontend: npm run rebuild && concurrently "npm run start-backend" "npm run frontend-nodemon"
scripts.dev-backend: nodemon --verbose --watch src/backend -e ts --exec "npm run rebuild && npm run start-backend"
scripts.start-backend: set NODE_ENV=testing&& set DB_USER=testdb2019&& set DB_PASSWORD=testdb2019&& concurrently "npm run start-collector" "npm run start-api"
scripts.start: npm run rebuild && concurrently "npm run start-collector" "npm run start-api" "npm run start-server"

author: Yi Zhang
